metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11712 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: WebCore/platform/network/soup/SocketStreamHandleImplSoup.cpp in the libsoup network backend of WebKit, as used in WebKitGTK+ versions 2.20.0 and 2.20.1, failed to perform TLS certificate verification for WebSocket connections.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.2-1').
